DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics single dose FXR-450 healthy Japanese men .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating FXR-450 Healthy Japanese Men
DOC.detailed_description: This study terminate May 2008 . The reason termination due pharmacokinetics issue . The decision terminate due safety tolerability .
DOC.criteria: Men age 20 45 year . Healthy determine investigator . Nonsmoker smoker few 10 cigarette per day . A history active presence clinically important medical disease . Any surgical medical condition may interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion test article ( e.g. , resection liver , kidney , gallbladder , gastrointestinal tract ) .
